definition: a quantum of energy in a crystal lattice or other system that has position, momentum, and can in some respects be regarded as a particle
details:
noun
- a quantum of energy in a crystal lattice or other system that has position, momentum, and can in some respects be regarded as a particle
= example: a quantum of energy in a crystal lattice or other system that has position, momentum, and can in some respects be regarded as a particle
